name: Through the storm
description:
A game for the Austrian DeJAMber 2020.

Story

Your grandma has fallen ill.
In the nearby forest lives a witch, whose herbs can cure your grandma, so rush through the snow to get the medicine.

Gameplay

Take the protective crystal out of its stand, to start.
After a while, you get in the middle of a snow storm. If you are not under protection, it's game over.
Put the crystal in other protective stands on your way, to create a shield to protect you from the storm.
After you solve a riddle and take back the crystal, the storm calms down for a while, and you can go on.
There are vile creatures on your way. If they detect you, it's game over.
